title: Setup this blog
text:
This is the first post to document how to setup this blog and to get familiar with the Quarto engine.
I’m following the quarto documentation here: Quarto more specifically the Creating a Blog guide.

title: Setup this blog
text:
Setup
First, I installed the package in RStudio: install.packages("quarto") Then, in RStudio, I created a new project using the Quarto template. We need to reopen Rstudio after installing quarto for the option to become visible. Then I selected: File > New Project > Quarto Blog.

title: Philppe G-Duval
text: Welcome! I’m Philippe G-Duval, a seasoned Director at STATLOG with over 12 years of experience in data and analytics. My expertise lies in constructing statistical models, particularly in the realm of finance and credit risk modeling. When I’m not immersed in data, you can either find me logging wood or crafting intricate designs with my mastery of crochet!

title: Post With Code
text: This is a post with executable code.

title: Post With Code
text:
Air Quality
Figure 1 further explores the impact of temperature on ozone level.

library(ggplot2)

ggplot(airquality, aes(Temp, Ozone)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth(method = "loess")




Figure 1: Temperature and ozone level.
